Reiki I & II training

Usui Holy Fire® III Reiki I & II Training in Salt Lake City, UT

Call now to schedule a set up a time to heal your mind, body, and spirit.

Call Us (385) 483-2264

Discover the Power of Usui Holy Fire® III Reiki I & II Training

Welcome to the Usui Holy Fire® III Reiki I & II training, where you can embark on a transformative journey of self-discovery and healing. Whether you're new to the world of energy healing or have some prior experience, this training offers you a pathway to reduce stress, balance energy, and promote healing for yourself and others.

In this comprehensive training, you will learn powerful techniques that will empower you to tap into the healing potential within you. The curriculum is designed to provide you with a solid foundation in Reiki, enabling you to confidently offer full Reiki sessions to yourself and others.

One of the remarkable aspects of this training is the Level I & II Reiki placements, also known as attunements. These energetic initiations will enhance your ability to channel the healing energy of Reiki. With the guidance of our experienced Reiki Master Teachers, you will receive these attunements, allowing you to access the full potential of Reiki's healing power.

Reiki I & II Training

Come as you are, with an open heart and a desire to learn Reiki.

Call Us (385) 483-2264

Benefits of Reiki Training: A Holistic Approach to Well-being

One of the beautiful aspects of learning Reiki is that no prior experience in health care or natural healing is required. You can come as you are, with an open heart and a willingness to learn. Reiki is accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or beliefs. It is a gentle and non-invasive healing modality that harmonizes with your innate healing abilities.

As you progress through the training, you will discover the profound benefits of Reiki, not only for physical healing but also for emotional, mental, and spiritual well-being. Here are some of the benefits you can expect to experience:

  • Stress reduction: Reiki helps to alleviate stress, promoting deep relaxation and inner calm. It supports the body's natural ability to find balance and release tension.
  • Enhanced energy flow: Reiki clears energetic blockages and restores the flow of vital life force energy, bringing a sense of vitality and rejuvenation.
  • Emotional balance: Reiki assists in releasing emotional imbalances, providing a space for healing and fostering emotional well-being.
  • Physical healing: Reiki supports the body's natural healing processes, helping to relieve pain, boost the immune system, and accelerate recovery.
  • Mental clarity and focus: Reiki helps to quiet the mind, promoting mental clarity, enhanced concentration, and improved decision-making.
  • Spiritual connection: Reiki deepens your connection with your inner self and the universal life force energy, nurturing a sense of spirituality and interconnectedness.
  • Self-care and self-empowerment: Reiki empowers you to take an active role in your own healing journey. It cultivates self-awareness, self-love, and self-compassion.

Throughout the training, you will be provided with a comprehensive manual that serves as a valuable resource to support your learning and practice. The manual covers essential Reiki concepts, hand positions, symbols, and techniques, ensuring you have a solid understanding of the principles and practices of Reiki.

Practical application is a vital component of the training. You will have the opportunity to participate in guided practice sessions, allowing you to refine your skills and build confidence in giving Reiki treatments to others. These hands-on experiences provide a nurturing and supportive environment for your growth as a Reiki practitioner. Contact us today at (385) 483-2264 to learn more!

Join a Supportive Community and Embrace Your Healing Journey

By learning Reiki, you become part of a vibrant and supportive community of like-minded individuals who are passionate about personal growth and well-being. The journey of becoming a Reiki practitioner extends beyond the training itself, as it opens up avenues for continued learning, practice, and personal transformation.

No matter where you are in life, learning Reiki can be a profound and life-changing experience. It offers you the opportunity to cultivate self-care, embrace your innate healing abilities, and make a positive impact on the lives of others.
